name: ikagaka.balloon.js
description: Ukagaka Balloon Surface Renderer for Web Browser

scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: rm -rf bower_components node_modules; npm update; bower update
scripts.start: http-server -o --silent -p 8000 & watchify lib/index.js --standalone Balloon -o dist/Balloon.js -v & coffee -c -w -o lib src/*.coffee
scripts.build: coffee -c -o lib src/*.coffee; browserify lib/index.js --standalone Balloon -o dist/Balloon.js

author: Ikagaka
